message.body: Just watched the flash mob - looks great and smart to pull in twitter and gaga! How are u?
Where did you see it? I'm not great, still in new ulm, still no answers
On twitter! Is he conscious? Love you
On opium. So sort of
He is on opium??
Yea, or an opiate... It's supposed to keep him out of the bathroom less?
Amanda r is his nurse tonight
She is sweet - I'm so sorry to hear about all of this medical problems
Yea it's a little unreal
It's either you or this area of 169 and 494 that are bad bad luck. Or both. God damn.
The tires can't handle the weight and lightness of our conversations
Just wept in front of a state patrol officer. Low point!
And I bet he was awkward...
This is crazy. First evacuation in nyc ever - they're closing the subway tomorrow at noon
Man oh man. Be aware of any Jesus looking men around, he'll have more info I'm sure
Jfk airport potentially under water.
What is that spanish word that u told me about and wrote about? Something to do with caring for someone
Just made it to baby's!
Good. Is pranna closed?
Yeah everything is closed cuz trains close in an hour - some grocery stores are opened. Water is sold out!
Jesus. What an experience!
My apartment is on the cusp of zone b and c so good thing I'm on second floor
What are the zones? What about the new apartment?
New apartment should be fine - they have evacuation zones. A is the worst and they have to evacuate by 5 today. it's based on mostly flooding potential
We will DIE if the power doesn't even go out. This is so funny!!
Why will you die???
Because we have so much water, ice, and pasta that baby cooked. And now we just wait. It's so funny
I need a really fuckin good book to read. I was going to read immortality by kundera but it's not available. Suggestions?
I hear the book thief is good. Have you read Paul farmer?
I haven't read paul farmer and I'm not sure if I'm up for non fiction right now? Book thief is SO good
Have you read ruiz zafon?
No I haven't even heard of him. All of the books I know I know through you... :(
I bought his book shadow of wind, apparently he is a famous spanish author?
Oh hah. How are you guys?
We just danced around the table to beyonce, recorded it with 3 computers and robert is going to splice. We're going crazy!! Robert and sasha watched 8 episodes
Of ugly betty and I read.
Which beyond song?
We did schoolin life but now we r doing till the world ends - it's easier. My fuckin mac camera failed TWICE so we have to do it again.
:( dont give up it will make me happy for HOURS
Yeah we r adding two more cameras and taking my computer away so we have 4 angles. U will love sasha's fro!
Katie didn't pick up and never called back. I'll keep you updated!
Did tim talk to her
No he couldn't get a hold of her
She texted me yesterday evening
About what?
The storm
Is she ok?
Yeah I'm sure because we video chatted tyler who was in dc like at 1 am
Beyonce love on top vmas
Beyonce is pregnant!!!! And she just performed and then opened her jacket to show - precious!!! And jay z is so cute about it
OMG I DIED
I'm scared for that child. Hi dad and mom. Why are you made of gold? Stop glowing
Ok remember the way u cried when we watched my sister's keeper? Yep, just finished Cutting for Stone and I was WEEPING
Oh no! No work today? What is that movie?
No work because they didn't know if the trains would work yipeee - hopefully I can sign my lease and start the move. It's a book about twin brothers born in
Ethiopia who become surgeons. It's a gasp/weep ending that keeps on going!!
Any updates on your dad?
I want to read it!!! My mom said he turned a corner last night for the better. Dont know how yet but that's good news!
Good news and yes you would love this book - keep me updated. Happy monday :)

Thanks, you too :) Sofie is telling me about things with Katie. I think I should stop talking to Sofie for a while. She makes me feel really anxious. Which I deserve. I guess I'm already there with that. Can't handle more
Yeah Sofie shouldn't be playing middle man, no one should. When you're ready you and katie should talk.
When do you think shed be ready? Can I ask if you've talked to her?
She talked to me very briefly last night and she doesn't want me to talk to you about, which I respect. The conclusion was that I'm not the person to talk to
Because she feels like I've already known the situation and no matter what I will defend your actions. I think it's a good thing
Whats a good thing? Yea that's totally legitimate of her. And I'm sorry and thank you for being in a difficult position due to me. I appreciate how good and fair you are to her and I.
I think it's good that she made the decision that I'm probably not the best person to talk to you. The universe is sometimes right on because I wouldn't have
Been able to handle this two months ago but things are clicking over here on the east coast so it's not as overwhelming
*talk to. NOT you
Please know that I want to be more help than hurt or harm to you always
Of course, I don't feel resentful at all. I'm just here, in this position, and I surprisingly feel fine. Everything feels like in it's a period of growth so im
Ready to learn
*just to be clear, we decided I'm not the best person to talk to KATIE
Meaning I can still talk to you?
Yes of course!
Are you available now? Gchat? Or are you going to start moving?
I have to start packing up because I have to leave in about 30. But I can probably chat tonight
Ok cool, good luck!
Do you think I could or should email her? Or wait a while?
I'm concerned it would build more drama if I do it right away so maybe she could have some time with it, unless it would build if she's waiting for a response
She's pretty angry so regardless of when the first call is made I think it's not going to feel the best - I would do it before the end of this week though
You think I should call instead of email?
?? Idk
At least whatever part of me died when she found out was reincarnated as the offspring of beyonce
Hey missy I can chat in the next few hours if u want to :)
Mmk, I might work late but I'm on Gchat or can call in a while
Kk - I'm running a few errands in queens so why don't u call me when u can
Mmk :)
